description.en: The course will comprise of seminars and individual studies. On each seminar, students will present the topic of their master's thesis, show the analysis of the collected experimental data, provide the plan of future work, discuss the results with other students and supervisors.
description.et: Aine käigus süvendatakse oskusi teadusliku ettekande tegemiseks ja osalemiseks diskussioonis.Nõuded suuliseks ettekandeks: üldine probleemiasetus, illustreeriv materjal, järeldused. Nõuded teaduspublikatsioonile: tulemuste reprodutseeritavus,materjali ja meetodite tutvustus, oponeerimise protseduur, autori õigused ja kohustused. Stuudiumi jooksul on vaja esineda seminaridel kahe ettekandega. Ettekannete teemad fikseeritakse magistrandi õpingukavas. Ettekannete koostamist kontrollib ja hindab juhendaja.

objectives.en: The prime objective of the course is develop students' learning skills, improve presentation skills,  to gain a deeper understanding of the bachelor's thesis subject. To study how to present your data and do presentations, study to review works, answer questions.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on arendada tudengi õpimisoskust, õpetada teha ettekannet, kaitsta enda tööd suuliselt ja kirjalkult, kirjutada ülevaadet teiste tudengite teadustööst, arutleda teadustööd küsimuste ja vastuste formaadis.

learning_outcomes.en:
By the end of the course student will:
- get experience in presenting scientific material
- gain a deeper understanding of the master's thesis subject
- gain experience in discussing scientific topics

independent_work.et: Every student makes one 15 minutes presentation about the master thesis research progress. Presentation is followed by discussion with fellow students and supervisors.

description.et: Every student makes one 15 minutes presentation about the master thesis research progress. Presentation is followed by discussion with fellow students and supervisors.
Supervisors need to be present during the presentation and write the opinion letter on student's workload, progress, etc.

grade_preconditions.et: It is obligatory for students to participate in every seminar and make a presentation.

grade_evaluation.et: E-learning and participation in all seminars
